about.title: About Us ‚Äì AvePay | Avenatec Lda
about.p1: AvePay is a multi-currency payment gateway developed by Avenatec ‚Äì Tecnologia e Comunica√ß√£o, SU, Lda, an Angolan financial technology company born to simplify, modernize, and internationalize the way people and businesses move money in Angola and worldwide.
about.p2: More than just a payment processor, AvePay is a complete financial ecosystem: it allows creating digital business accounts, sending and receiving payments in various currencies (Kwanza, USD, Euro, Pound, Real, Yuan, Rand, Naira, Yen, and even cryptocurrencies), issuing corporate cards, generating payment links, automating invoicing, and integrating with management systems and e-commerce platforms like WordPress, Shopify, Magento, and Joomla.
about.p3: With AvePay, companies, freelancers, and organizations can receive payments from national and international customers securely, quickly, and at competitive rates, without currency barriers. Our goal is to unite Africa and the world through financial technology, offering solutions that promote inclusion, efficiency, and trust in the digital environment.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about AvePay.

items.question: What is AvePay?
items.answer: AvePay is a global payments and finance platform that allows businesses to accept payments in multiple currencies, manage business accounts, and control spending, all in one place.

items.question: What payment methods are accepted?
items.answer: We accept a wide range of payment methods, including Visa, Mastercard, Unitel Money, Kwanza references, PIX, MBWay, and even cryptocurrencies, depending on the chosen plan.

items.question: Can I receive in Kwanza and withdraw in another currency?
items.answer: Yes. One of the main advantages of AvePay is the ability to receive payments in Kwanza (AOA) and withdraw the funds to your account anywhere in the world, in currencies like Dollar (USD), Euro (EUR), Real (BRL), among others.

items.question: Is AvePay secure?
items.answer: Security is our top priority. We are PCI DSS and SOC1 & SOC2 certified, use SSL encryption, and hold funds in secure and regulated financial institutions.

items.question: How can I integrate AvePay into my website?
items.answer: We offer a robust and well-documented API, along with step-by-step guides and code examples for various languages. The integration is designed to be quick and simple.

items.question: Are there monthly fees?
items.answer: No, our main plans do not have monthly fees. We charge a one-time adhesion fee and a small percentage per transaction, making costs predictable and affordable.

items.question: Are there fees for withdrawing funds?
items.answer: Yes, we apply a 3% fee on the withdrawal amount. This fee has a minimum value of 100 Kz and a maximum value of 3,500 Kz, ensuring that costs are always predictable and fair, regardless of the transaction amount.
